entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:19 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
